Class Leopard

java.lang.Object
Piece
Leopard
public class Leopard extends Piece
The class Leopard represents a Leopard Piece.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Ysabel Bondoc, Jaime Manalo

  • Constructor Details

    • Leopard

      public Leopard​(boolean red, int r, int c)
      This constructor sets the attributes of the Leopard piece
      Parameters:
      red - whether the Leopard is a red or blue piece
      r - the initial row location of the Leopard on the board
      c - the initial column location of the Leopard on the board

    • canMove

      public boolean canMove​(int r, int c)
      This method checks where the Leopard can move when there is no other piece on their destination
      Specified by:
      canMove in class Piece
      Parameters:
      r - the row coordinate the piece is moving to
      c - the column coordinate the piece is moving to
      Returns:
      whether the piece can move to this tile or not
